title: MPLS Transport Profile (MPLS-TP) Traffic Engineering (TE) Management Information Base (MIB)
abstract:
This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use
with network management protocols in the Internet community.  In particular, it
describes additional managed objects and textual conventions for tunnels,
identifiers, and Label Switching Routers to support Multiprotocol Label
Switching (MPLS) MIB modules for transport networks.
